section_a.beneficiaries: The company’® activities will provide benefit to ... The public, small businesses and most importantly the environment. Our goal is to show and teach individuals on how to become part of zero waste culture, recycling their own plastic, sorting it in the proper way, then create and reuse as they see fit. The main goal is to show them exactly the benefits, not only for themselves, but for the environment and how big of a positive impact it will have in the future
